titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z255: Ketubah, 1932.

notesStmt.note: 1 sheet: Printed in blue, red, green, and gold ink.
Decorated with depictions of holy places, including the Holy Temple, the Western Wall, the cities of Jericho and Shechem, and graves of prophets and saints.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
